title: High Noon Thresh
body: A cowboy thresh skin where his Q is a lasso his W is a old time lantern his E is a tumbleweed and his R is a rodeo stadium! i think this would be an awesome skin please give your input

replies.body: I'm a thresh main and yes any skin is good.

And his E could be a ghost horse sweeping them away.

{{summoner:6}} {{champion:120}}
